item.description: Collection to Creat, Read, Update and Delete users.

request.description: Endpoint to login. If login is successfull, API responds with **auth_token** HTTP Only cokie. The JWT token is contained in that cokie.
Logout endpoint. This endpoint removes the **auth_token** cokie
Forgot password endpoint. This endpoint sends a password recovery email.

response.name: Forgot password email sent

request.description: Reset password endpoint. This endpoint allows to retet a user's password given the recover token sent through email.
This endpoint allows to add or withdraw money from loged in user's account. If amount is positive, money is added to the account, if amount is negative, money will be withdrew from the account.
